relevance_explanation: The routine was correctly trimmed to include only steps relevant to the customer with a standard 401K account. The retrieval of account information was simplified to only inform the customer of their account type without the extra details.
completeness_explanation: All logic, tools, and branches required for this customer are retained. The steps calling the necessary tools `validate_address`, `update_address`, `apply_address_hold`, and `complete_case` are all present.
